overview.en: Clipper is a decentralized financial ecosystem that provides crypto banking, asset management and brokerage services. Clipper is founded by a team of Wall Street finance professionals, backed by top Silicon Valley VC, and a founding member of Hong Kong Blockchain Association. Clipper utilizes CCC as its platform token, which issues 100USDT dividends per year per 10,000CCC, distributed daily.
overview.zh: Clipper 数币银行是一个去中心化金融生态，为您提供支付，兑换，存贷，理财等一站式数币金融服务。 Clipper 数币银行有华尔街/硅谷投资机构背书，香港区块链协会保证，专业金融团队运营，严谨风控，安全合规。 Clipper 采用 CCC 为平台币，并发放红利：每1万CCC每年享有100USDT的红利，每天发放。
